parameter.value: I am the one responsible for this post office here in Casteldine. If you have questions about the mail system or the depots, just ask me.
The mail system enables you to send and receive letters and parcels. You can buy them here if you want.
The depots are very easy to use. Just step in front of them and you will find your items in them. They are free for everyone to use.
You may of course send letters and parcels to this city aswell.
It's my name.
Tha'Reen is located to the far south-west on an island. You may send parcels and letters to this city.
Celeres is far to the north. You may send parcels and letters to this city.
Adanac is located in the far west. You may send parcels and letters to this city.
Valid destinations for letters and parcels are Casteldine, Tha'Reen, Adanac and Celeres.
